name: @lagoni/asyncapi-quicktype-template
description: Template to generate files with quicktype.
author: Jonas Lagoni (jonas-lt@live.dk)

quicktypeLanguage.description: Which type of language should be generated

renderOptions.description: Provide a JSON object as a string which should be parsed to quicktype.

subTargetDir.description: which relative target sub directory should it be rendered to. It is relative to where the generators targetDir.
